jobs.title: Coding Expertise for AI Training.English_South Africa
jobs.description: Outlier helps the world’s most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models? We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
responsibilities: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models.
Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

skills: Proficiency in JavaScript/ TypeScript, Python, C++, Java, Swift, and Verilog
Ability to articulate complex concepts fluently in South African English
Excellent attention to detail, including grammar, punctuation, and style guidelines
Currently enrolled in or completed a bachelor's degree or higher in computer science at a selective institution

benefits: Rates vary based on expertise, skills assessment, location, project need, and other factors. For example, higher rates may be offered to PhDs.

communityImpact.description: This role contributes to developing software that enhances community services and accessibility.

jobs.title: South Africa English Writer
jobs.description: Outlier helps the world’s most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced South African English writer who would like to lend your expertise to train AI models?
responsibilities: Reading English text in order to rank a series of responses that were produced by an AI model
Writing a short story in English about a given topic
Assessing whether a piece of English text produced by an AI model is factually accurate
Use your knowledge of English local slang and colloquial phrases to teach the AI model

skills: Professional writing experience (copywriter, journalist, technical writer, editor, etc.)
Enrollment in or completion of degree at a top university with at least a Bachelors degree

benefits: Rates vary based on expertise, skills assessment, location, project need, and other factors. For example, higher rates may be offered to PhDs.

communityImpact.description: This role contributes to developing software that enhances community services and accessibility.

jobs.title: Sesotho Sa Leboa Freelance Writer
jobs.description: Outlier helps the world’s most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced Sesotho sa Leboa writer who would like to lend your expertise to train AI models?
responsibilities: Reading Sesotho sa Leboa (South Africa) text in order to rank a series of responses that were produced by an AI model
Writing a short story in Sesotho sa Leboa(South Africa) about a given topic
Assessing whether a piece of Sesotho sa Leboa (South Africa) text produced by an AI model is factually accurate

experience: Professional writing experience (copywriter, journalist, technical writer, editor, etc.)
skills: Outlier is looking for talented writers with fluency in Sesotho sa Leboa to help train generative artificial intelligence models.
This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you

benefits: Rates vary based on expertise, skills assessment, location, project need, and other factors. For example, higher rates may be offered to PhDs.

communityImpact.description: This position helps enhance our outreach programs, fostering stronger community relationships.
